snippet.title: LEFT ALIVE - Announcement Teaser | PS4
snippet.description:
LEFT ALIVE™ is a brand-new survival action shooter coming to the PlayStation®4 computer entertainment system.  
Veteran developers, Toshifumi Nabeshima (director, Armored Core series), Yoji Shinkawa (character designer, METAL GEAR series), and Takayuki Yanase (mech designer, Ghost in the Shell: Arise, Mobile Suit Gundam 00, Xenoblade Chronicles X) join forces to create LEFT ALIVE’s dark and gritty world.

For more information visit http://www.Left-Alive.com
Keep up to date with the latest news by following us at:
Twitter.com/LeftAliveGame
Facebook.com/LeftAliveGame
#LeftAlive

May contain content inappropriate for children, visit http://www.esrb.org for rating information

© SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD. All Rights Reserved. CHARACTER DESIGN: YOJI SHINKAWA 
LEFT ALIVE is a registered trademark or trademark of Square Enix Co., Ltd.
SQUARE ENIX and the SQUARE ENIX logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of Square Enix Holdings Co., Ltd.
"PlayStation" and the "PS" Family logo are registered trademarks and "PS4" is a trademark of Sony Interactive Entertainment Inc. The ratings icon is a registered trademark of the Entertainment Software Association. All other marks are properties of their respective owners.
